extensions.name: AP_PieMenus
extensions.description:
Speed up your workflow with the most frequently used Harmony tools arranged into five themed pie menus: Animation, Node View, Selection, Painting and Effects. Each pie contains eight commonly used tools, for a total of 40 (so far)!

How to Use

You'll need the following three extensions installed:
  1. openHarmony - this is required for pie menus to work
  2. AP_PieMenus - that's why we're here
  3. ScriptShortcuts - this adds a Pie Menu category in Harmony's Edit > Keyboard Shortcuts list

Now go to Edit > Keyboard Shortcuts and you should see a brand new Pie Menus category. Why not use your brush tool keyboard shortcut [B] to bring up the Painting pie menu? That's what I did anyway, but hey that's up to you I suppose.

Requires openHarmony 0.2.8
extensions.author: Adam Phillips
